text: A pleasure especially to meet & reconnect with Ms. Jyoti Pande Lavakare @CareForAirIndia, a mentor and friend who brought me into the air pollution space over 7 years ago! https://t.co/EJ3sFSQcpY

It was a pleasure & privilege to share the stage with @DrMonikaArora @Harshalsalve @manjeetssaluja @NPCCHH @CPCB_OFFICIAL @AnandKr91880522 @sagnikdey @PoornimaPrabha3 @UNEP @UNDP_India @KhaiwalPGI @meenal_thakare.

Pleasure to speak at the 7th NCSC on #NCDs & #airpollution hosted by @HIA_NCD & @capher_india. I emphasised on the importance of amplifying #youthvoices in policy deliberations around #climateaction. https://t.co/cQEJHIVLG0
Looking forward to speaking at Lodhi Road later today at this very relevant panel organised by @HIA_NCD @capher_india @Hriday_Org! https://t.co/Enf8GSXScy

@ICwS_SAS @SASNews @LondonU I write on the need to introspect on the modus operandi of the #Commonwealth to empower youth across the institution to focus on #climateaction. In doing so, @commonwealthsec would be able to position itself as a powerful, effective and global powerhouse for international policy

urls.title: The Commonwealth & Climate Change - Youth Perspective
urls.description: The key to unlocking the (thus far untapped) vast power and potential of the Commonwealth entails resisting the temptation to define it solely in terms of common ideals and values… The lock to that key is what we’ve come to know as the climate crisis. A concrete vision for the Commonwealth has been long required. The 2013 Charter of the Commonwealth was certainly a step in the right direction, but a long road remains to be traversed. Gabon and Togo – both of whom possess an imperfect record of human

text:
Ahead of #CommonwealthDay & the upcoming #Coronation2023, I was delighted delighted to write for The Institute of Commonwealth Studies @ICwS_SAS at the School of Advanced Studies @SASNews @LondonU.    

https://t.co/GTGlmZSyj5
Kudos to @CanadainIndia @MASH_Project for providing young people with an empowering platform such as this one, where conversations were meaningful, impactful, and not tokenistic!

Pleasure to speak at @CanadainIndia this morning, at a conversation hosted by @MASH_Project! Delightful to meet @HCCanInd & share the stage with @iamMostlySane, @pakhiforpaws, @Cpsawant @_SnehaShahi_ & others for key conversations around #climateaction and #Sustainability https://t.co/z9HKywGIFO

Looking forward to speaking @CanadainIndia tomorrow morning in collaboration with @stc_india @MASH_Project! 

@_SnehaShahi_ @iamMostlySane @Cpsawant @jasveenkauroff @HCCanInd @jasvinder1979 @pragyavats @AnubhaGoyall https://t.co/tiITrhacsN

Pleasure to meet and interact with @JamesCleverly, Secretary @FCDOGovUK @iitdelhi during the launch of the UKYP scheme. Had the opportunity to share my work on #ClimateAction in the #commonwealth, & my aspirations for the same. Thanks for the introduction @AlexWEllis @UKinIndia! https://t.co/CZV4uSKl65

27.02.23 #WaysDemocracyDied

1. @prasarbharati (runs @DDNational & @airnewsalerts) signed a contract with @RSSorg-backed @HindusthanMedia after cancelling it's subscription with @PTI_News 

2. Report suggests that @ANI has been quoting think tanks and experts that don't exist!

Looking forward to speaking on this issue that's very close to my heart! The fight for clean air requires cross-sectional conversations spanning across stakeholder groups in society to facilitate collective action. https://t.co/9uwLBgO8cA

Honoured to have had the opportunity to meet and interact with fellow South Asian youth climate leaders at #CACN hosted by @orfonline @USAndIndia to collaborate on finding solutions to #climatechange! Listen in for my thoughts! https://t.co/6jaFnZlPoZ
Pleasure to meet and interact with #G20India coordinator Ambassador @harshvshringla at the sidelines of the @orfonline @USAmbIndia conference on #SouthAsian Youth in Climate https://t.co/BlJDyNAlqY

A pleasure to also meet @PScotlandCSG, the honourable Sec-Gen of the Commonwealth and several distinguished scientists, academics, environmentalists and journalists! 

#climateaction #youthempowerment https://t.co/0czg7xmFWQ

I spoke on the need for better frameworks for the implementation of climate agreements (such as the LDF), and the responsibility of global institutions to provide youth with not just a seat, but also a say at the table.

An honour to speak at @CWRoundTable's conference at @CumberlandLodge in Windsor in the session on 'Climate Change, Small States, Inequality & Development' alongside @nmco2 of the @commonwealthsec & @loomnie, moderated by the wonderful @rita_payne. #climatechange @CwHumanEcology https://t.co/SZ83SVH26z
